seer.name: Seer
seer.description: Can see another player's role card or two middle cards.

robber.name: Robber
robber.description: May swap roles with another player and view new role. The robber is on the team of the card he takes.

troublemaker.name: Troublemaker
troublemaker.description: May swap roles of two other players. Do not view either role.

villager.name: Villager
villager.description: The ultimate beta male. Can't do anything.
